statements: DELETE FROM livestock_management WHERE id = 1 AND animal_name = 'Cow';
DELETE FROM LivestockHealthRecords WHERE id = 5 AND health_status = 'Sick';
DELETE FROM BreedingInformation WHERE breeding_date < '2022-01-01' AND breeding_status = 'Pregnant';
DELETE FROM breeding_information WHERE sire_id = 100 AND birth_weight > 5.5;
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE livestock_id = 2 AND treatment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Breeding WHERE breeding_date < '2021-01-01' AND offspring_count < 2;
DELETE FROM HealthRecords WHERE livestock_id = 10 AND treatment_date = '2022-04-15';
